summary: Completed comprehensive testing of TaskFlow AI-powered voice task inbox application. All core functionality working correctly with 100% backend API success rate and fully functional frontend integration.
passed_tests: All 19 backend API endpoints (100% success rate)
Task CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete)
Voice processing with AI integration (GPT-5.2 and Gemini models)
API-to-UI integration (tasks created via API appear in UI)
Task status updates via API reflect in UI
Speech recognition setup in voice overlay
